text: How confident are you that you can spot a fraudulent email or website very quickly?
How confident are you in your ability to identify online scams, compared to the average IIIT student?
How confident are you that your technical background makes you less likely to fall for a sophisticated scam?
How confident are you in your ability to determine if an email sender is legitimate or fake?
How confident are you that you would spot an email trying to steal your account credentials?
How confident are you in your ability to spot a fake or 'clone' login page?
How confident are you in your ability to tell the difference between a real university announcement and a fake one?
How confident are you in your ability to distinguish a real security alert from a fake one?
How confident are you in your ability to recognize when a message is using psychological tricks (like urgency or fear) to make you click?
How confident are you in your overall understanding of online security best practices?
